item.title: [PI] misc.random Code
item.dc:creator: @Darkmist Darkmist
item.description:
@Darkmist wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:3, topic:406799”] private static final Random RANDOM = new Random(); // ... final Location location = new Location(RANDOM.nextInt(8192), RANDOM.nextInt(8192), 0); [/quote]

Wow that just messed with my head, Mind explaining how this works? also would u be able to work the code with this

getPA().checkObjectSpawn(75, 3306, 9197, 0, 10);
getPA().checkObjectSpawn(75, 3302, 9195, 0, 10);
getPA().checkObjectSpawn(75, 3305, 9193, 0, 10);

Cos thats what i needs :\ I need the object to spawn in many different locations at different times

item.title: [PI] misc.random Code
item.dc:creator: @Darkmist Darkmist
item.description:
@Darkmist wrote:

Im making a system that requires teleports to be randomly generated by the misc.random code, Im not sure how to do this if someone could give me an example for 2 different teleport coords that will help me out alot, ill supply the 2 coords I just need to see how the code works to be able to keep adding more

here are the coords

c.getPA().spellTeleport(3247, 9567, 0);

c.getPA().spellTeleport(2985, 9632, 0);

thanks in advance to those who can help put
